channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Don’t Miss the Arch’s End-of-Summer Block Party!
item.description: Date: Wednesday, August 7, 2024 4:30 PM - 10:30 PM - Students are welcome to join The Arch Office as it celebrates the end of the Arch summer term! The event will feature Bicentennial Ice Cream, BBQ ribs, a pizza truck, giveaways, live music, games and activities, and an outdoor movie screening, so don’t miss the fun!
item.author: Students

item.title: “Center of Gravity” Series Continues August 7
item.description: Date: Wednesday, August 7, 2024 4:00 PM - 10:00 PM - The Center of Gravity is your one-stop for personal, academic and well-being success this summer! Activities include novelty food and snacks, academic support from peer tutors and course TAs, away semester searches with the CCPD, wellness and well-being activities, water coloring, Legos, book clubs and more, so be sure to visit weekly!
item.author: Community

item.title: ECSE Seminar to be Held August 7
item.description: Date: Wednesday, August 7, 2024 2:00 PM - 3:00 PM - This seminar will feature Hasan M. Nayfeh, Ph.D., Senior Scientist/Engineer at Quantum Computing, IBM T.J. Watson Research Center, in Yorktown Heights, New York, who will present “Scaling up Superconducting Quantum Processors: Materials and Fabrication Challenges.”
item.author: Community

item.title: Session to Review Certificates in Analytics, Machine Learning and AI
item.description: Date: Wednesday, August 7, 2024 12:00 PM - 12:30 PM - Join Rensselaer at Work Dean Aric Krause, Ph.D., for a session highlighting Rensselaer’s online, project-based graduate certificate programs in Analytics, Machine Learning and AI. Attendees can expect to learn how data can inform better decisions, and will review an analytic method that can be used regardless of the tools at hand. Please register to attend….
item.author: Community

item.title: Collegiate Store Offering Birthday Specials for Faculty, Staff
item.description: The Collegiate Store is happy to announce that it will be celebrating RPI faculty and staff birthdays with an invitation to shop for one clothing or gift item at 20% off. Beginning in March 2024, faculty and staff can just come in during their birthday month to get their coupon, which can then be used in-store or online.
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: Faculty/Staff Webinar to Discuss Ways to Handle Student Absences
item.description:
Date: Tuesday, August 20, 2024 10:30 AM - 11:00 AM - In this Quick Learn workshop, Maureen Fodera of the Office of Undergraduate Education will offer some of the best practice strategies faculty can use for dealing with student absences. Please register if you plan to attend.
